Uses of Package
ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers

Packages that use ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers
ca.corefacility.gview.managers Provides for dynamic handling of different items on the map. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map Provides for implementations of the main GView map, as well as some extras (Birds eye view, etc). 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers Provides a controlled interface to the various styling objects. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui Provides for implementations of a simple GUI for the GView map. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.action.style Provides classes for modifying the style of the GView map. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.dialog Provides classes for different GView dialogs. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor Provides classes for the Style Editor. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.featureFilter Provides classes for different Feature Filters in the style editor. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.menu This package provides various custom icons. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.node Provides for different nodes of the Style Editor tree. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.panel Provides classes for different style editor panels. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.panel.propertyMapper Provides classes for the Property Mapper panel. 
ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.menu Provides classes different menus on the GView GUI. 
 

Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers used by ca.corefacility.gview.managers
StyleController
          This class is responsible for managing meta-level information regarding all the style controllers.
 

Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers used by ca.corefacility.gview.map
GUIController
          The GUI controller is responsible for maintaining a single instance of the GUI in it's entirety.
 

Classes in ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers used by ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers
BackboneStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the backbone style.
Controller
          The abstract class for style controllers.
FeatureHolderStyleToken
          This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
FileWriterManager
          This class is responsible for controlling access to file writing.
GenomeDataController
          This class controls access to the GenomeData object and provides methods for operating on that data.
GlobalStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the global style.
LabelStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the label styles.
LabelStyleToken
          This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
LegendItemStyleToken
          This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
LegendStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the legend styles.
LegendStyleToken
          This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
PlotStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling all access to the plot style by GUI elements.
PlotStyleToken
          This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
PropertyMappableToken
          This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
PropertyMapperController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the property mappers.
RulerStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the ruler style.
SetStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the feature holder styles.
SlotItemStyleToken
          This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
SlotStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the slot styles.
SlotStyleToken
          This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
StyleController
          This class is responsible for managing meta-level information regarding all the style controllers.
TooltipStyleController
          This class is responsible for controlling access to the tool tip style.
